appbar.allStepsCompTxt1: Congratulations! All the steps to set up the app were successfully done!
appbar.allStepsCompTxt2: and open one of your product pages. Once you add an item to the cart, the Facebook Subscribe popup will open!
appbar.vidIconTxt: Video Tutorial: How to Set Up

abandonedCarts.headerInfo: This section displays all the customers that have subscribed to receive notifications from your Store, along with the status of their order.
abandonedCarts.custRangeInfo: Select a start date and an end date to see the data for that specific period.
abandonedCarts.noDataTxt: You currently have no abandoned carts. Please note that we only track the abandoned carts from the moment you installed the app.

absenseToken: There seems to be an issue with your website. Please contact support at contact@marketpushapps.com to get this resolved quickly

dashboard.infoMsg: The Dashboard shows performance statistics of MarketPush Cart Recovery app within a selected time range.

card1.infoconMsg: How many times each message type was sent within the selected time period.

card2.infoconMsg: The metrics displayed are: how many carts were recovered in total, what’s the recovery percentage and how many carts were abandoned. Please note that a cart is considered recovered when the user pays for the previously abandoned order.

card3.infoconMsg: The metrics displayed are: the total of revenue recovered, the percentage of revenue recovered and how much revenue was lost.

card4.infoconMsg: The metrics displayed represent: The number of Abandoned Carts (red), the number of SMS Subscribers (orange), the number of Facebook Subscribers (blue), the number of Recovered Carts (green).

campaigns.smsModalText1: This is the message that your customers will receive on SMS
campaigns.smsModalText2: Please note that this interface is just for showcasing purposes and it’s not clickable.
campaigns.smsNotSendNightTime: SMS Messages are only sent to customers in the time frame 8AM - 10PM. Any message that is due during night-time will be sent at 8AM in the following day.
campaigns.waNotSendNightTime: Whatsapp Messages are only sent to customers in the time frame 8AM - 10PM. Any message that is due during nighttime will be sent at 8AM in the following day.
campaigns.waLanguageSelHint: Messages sent through Whatsapp must be pre-approved by the Whatsapp team. Select the language of your visitors. If you can’t find your language above, please let us know and we will add your language.

whatsAppCampaigns.hintDiscountRow: To increase the chances of recovering sales, you can include a discount coupon in your message. To generate a coupon, go to

campaigns.modalText1: This is the message that your customers will receive on Facebook.
campaigns.modalText2: Please note that this interface is for showcasing purposes and it's not clickable.

infocons.msg1: Send Facebook messages to customers that abandon a cart to remind them of their lost order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook and you can send them a maximum of 2 messages within 24 hours. You can consider adding a discount code within the messages in order to increase the sale conversion rate.
infocons.msg2: First Facebook message used to recover the abandoned cart. This message will be sent to customers that have consented to receive Facebook notifications from you.
infocons.msg3: After completing an order, send customers a Facebook message to inform them that you've received their order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook. In order to drive repeated sales from the contacted customers, you can consider adding a voucher code with a discount that they can apply to a future order on your shop.
infocons.msg4: After processing an order, send customers a Facebook message to inform them that you've shipped their order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook.
infocons.msg5: Quick Replies are possible reply variants that are offered to the user as part of your Facebook message. Feel free to customize the texts in your own language! There are 3 types of replies: "Sounds good" - the user can use this to let you know everything is fine. "I have more questions" - in this case, you should personally engage the user to clarify the questions related to the order. "Unsubscribe" - in this case, the user is not interested in purchasing and the app will not send any other messages to that particular user.
infocons.msg1SMS: Send SMS to customers that abandon a cart to remind them of their lost order. The customers have to subscribe in order to be contacted via SMS and you can send them a maximum of 2 messages within 24 hours. You can consider adding a discount code within the messages in order to increase the sale conversion rate.
infocons.placeholders: Placeholders are variables that you can use in your message which get replaced with the real values once the message is sent. {{CheckOutTotal}}, {{checkoutLink}} are only known at the moment of sending.

carts1.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.
carts1.discountTxt1: To increase the chances of recovering sales, you can include a discount coupon in your message. To generate a coupon, go to

smscarts1.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.
smscarts1.discountTxt1: In order to SAVE your campaign you need to make sure you set all the variables that you add in the SMS Message.

wacarts1.headerTxt: Set Live Whatsapp Abandoned Cart Message #1
wacarts1.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.
wacarts1.discountTxt1: In order to SAVE your campaign you need to make sure you set all the variables that you add in the SMS Message.

carts2.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.

smscarts2.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.
smscarts2.discountTxt1: In order to SAVE your campaign you need to make sure you set all the variables that you add in the SMS Message.

ordrrcpt.hint1: You can use details from the order like {{first_name}}, {{last_name}} directly in the text. If you want to give the user an incentive to buy, create a coupon code <here> and add it here as text.

ordrrcpt.subTitle: Subtitle

widgetViewCheckboxTopText.addToCart: Appears when the customer clicks on Add to Cart.
widgetViewCheckboxTopText.both: Appears when the customer clicks on Add to Cart and on Exit Intent.

widgets.hintTooltpiconTrigger: With Discount you can capture more leads by offering customers that subscribe a discount coupon.
widgets.popupTriger: When to show the popup to visitors
widgets.triggerAddToCart: Trigger popup on Add to Cart
widgets.PopupConsentWidget: Add a Subscribe Popup on your Site
widgets.requiredTrigger: You must select at least 1 popup trigger.
widgets.discSmallText: To increase the chances of recovering sales, you can include a discount coupon in your message. To generate a coupon, go to
widgets.discSmallTextManualCoupon: Please note that the app will not generate a coupon. You will have to manually generate it and include it above.
widgets.discText: With Discount you can capture more leads by offering customers that subscribe a discount coupon.
widgets.GathMess: Select recovery channels to include in your popup
widgets.headerInfo: In order to send abandoned cart reminders to your customers, they will first need to provide the consent. The purpose of this widget is to enable your customers to offer that consent. Feel free to customize the widget so that it matches the style of your website.
widgets.headerInfo2: The right part of the screen shows the popup that will be placed on your site and will appear when Add to cart is clicked. Customize it so that it matches your needs and set it to Active.
widgets.modalInfo: Customize the Consent Widget to match the style of your website.
widgets.notAvailableInYourCountry: Facebook is not available in your country for the moment, however, it will be available soon
widgets.channelsInfo: Enable one or more channels that visitors can choose to subscribe to. If they abandon the cart, they will receive messages on the selected channel to remind them of their lost order.
widgets.subscribeInfo: It's recommended to provide the visitors an incentive to subscribe in the form of a discount code. Please note that you need to manually generate the coupon code and add it in the app.
widgets.customizePopupHint: Customize the Popup to match the style of your site, modify or translate texts into the language of your users, if needed.
widgets.modalText1: This Subscribe Popup will appear to customers that click on Add to Cart.
widgets.modalText2: Please note that this interface is for showcasing purposes and it's not clickable.
widgets.cnclInfo: If the customer does not want to subscribe, this button will close the popup.
widgets.btnInfo: Once the customer grants the consent on a channel, the submit button becomes clickable. If you selected the Discount option, then it will reveal the reward to the user.
widgets.chckBoxNote: *In order to use the checkbox plugin, you need to
widgets.chckBoxNoteHref: whitelist your site in the settings of your facebook page

settingsPage.hintTelNumber: You can add your phone number in the SMS Cart Recovery messages.
settingsPage.addYourPhoneNumberCardInfo: This phone number is included in the sent SMS messages. Customers can use this phone number to get in touch with you.

fbCard1.tooltipText: Connect your Facebook page to the Cart Reminder App. Once connected, your Facebook page will send the messages to customers. Your personal details, such as your name, will not be visible to the message recipient - don't worry!
fbCard1.adminNote: Please note that you must be an admin of the page that you want to connect.
fbCard1.buttonFooter: If you don't have a facebook page, you can create one
fbCard1.adminErrHdr: Error: You are not an Admin
fbCard1.adminErrTxt: You do not have any Pages in which you have an Admin role. Please obtain the role or ask a Facebook Admin to add it for you. Alternatively, you can create a new Facebook Page
fbCard1.wbstUnpubErrTxt: Please connect a domain and publish your website in order to pair it with your Facebook Page, then refresh the page and connect the Facebook Page again.
fbCard1.isGdprAffected: For the moment Facebook recovery method is not available in your country. Facebook is working to make it available again. Please enable SMS Cart Recovery for your website instead.

fbCard2.info: Connect your Facebook page to the Cart Reminder App. Once connected, your Facebook page will send the messages to customers. Your personal details, such as your name, will not be visible to the message recipient - don't worry!
fbCard2.subheader: Choose the Facebook page that will be used to send messages to your customers.
fbCard2.dropdownSubText: The Facebook messages will be sent by the selected Page. Your name or other personal details will not be visible to users that receive your messages.

fbCard3.whtlstTxt: The connected Facebook page will send the messages to the customers. Your personal Facebook account will NOT be visible.
fbCard3.tutTxt: Your personal Facebook account will NOT be visible.

upgradeCard.attemptsLeft: 0 cart recovery attempts left this month
upgradeCard.body3: individual Cart Recovery attempts, with up to 2 messages per recovery attempt.
upgradeCard.body4: cart recovery attempts left this month.

accInfoCard.tooltipText: Add your contact information information. We will use your email to send you reports about app performance such as recovered sales.

tzCard.tooltipText: Add your timezone. All the displayed dates will be relative to the chosen timezone.
tzCard.label: Select Timezone

ModalJoin.recMarketPushTx: and to receive email updates from MarketPushApps.
ModalJoin.PlsNoteTx: Please note that due to recent Facebook updates the Facebook cart recovery is temporarily not available in the EU. If you reside in the EU, please only use SMS cart recovery until Facebook re-enables this feature for EU users.

ModalStepsCompleted.smsTitle: How to turn ON SMS Cart Recovery?
ModalStepsCompleted.smsInstruction1: Add your phone number in Settings.
ModalStepsCompleted.smsInstruction2: Activate at least one SMS Campaign.
ModalStepsCompleted.smsInstruction3: Activate site Popup Widget and enable SMS.
ModalStepsCompleted.waTitle: How to turn on WhatsApp Cart Recovery?
ModalStepsCompleted.waInstruction1: Add your phone number in Settings.
ModalStepsCompleted.waInstruction2: Activate at least one Whatsapp Campaign.
ModalStepsCompleted.waInstruction3: Activate site Popup Widget and enable WhatsAPP.
ModalStepsCompleted.fbTitle: How to turn ON Facebook Cart Recovery?
ModalStepsCompleted.fbInstruction2: Activate at least one FB Campaign.
ModalStepsCompleted.fbInstruction3: Activate site Popup Widget and enable FB.
ModalStepsCompleted.stillHaveQuestions: Follow the video tutorial bellow for a step-by-step guide.
